-Wives (ANMs) and Staff  Nurses (SNs) for managing  normal deliveries, 
identify complications, do basic management and then refer at the earliest to higher facilities 
thereby empowering them to save the life of both the mother and new born.
Th e earlier Guidelines in the year 2005 for Antenatal Care and Skilled Attendance at Birth 
by ANMs/LHVs and SNs has been revised and updated based on current scientifi c evidence
